thread.section_title: A.Roma Lifestyle Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Trip to Rome
thread.title_full: Trip to Rome - Review of A.Roma Lifestyle Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: frankmY4656KZ
title: Trip to Rome
text: On arrival the staff were helpful, friendly and courteous with us, and explained the local transport options available to us. As the hotel was located a distance away from the tourist spots, a shuttle service was provided which was very good. The room was very comfortable and clean. Meals were buffet style, but very varied and very good. Our deal included the use of the spa, which we really enjoyed using. Our only regret was that we were there for a short stay, and would liked a longer visit!
